attributes.action: Introduce a public holiday on the Monday after COVID-19 restrictions lifted.
attributes.additional_details: To allow people to celebrate and enjoy the lifting of restrictions.
attributes.background:
Although the country has been in lockdown, many keyworkers have been working throughout.  

To celebrate the lifting of COVID restrictions, we should have a public holiday to allow everyone to get together with family and friends

Anyone working should be given triple time (or double time off)

rejection.details:
You might like to sign the following petition:

Create a one off Bank Holiday on Monday June 21st 2021.
https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/555205
